error.message: Parameter $database of method Drupal\flood_bypass\FloodByPassService::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Database\Driver\mysql\Connection. Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. The MySQL database driver has been moved to the mysql module.

Call to deprecated method assertNoFieldByXPath() of class Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use $this->xpath() instead and assert that the result is empty.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
